articles.title: Bonnaroo Will Require Vaccination Or Negative Test As Live Music Adapts To Delta - NPR
articles.description: The Bonnaroo music festival in Tennessee announced today that it will require either proof of vaccination or a negative COVID-19 test to attend.
articles.content:
The crowd at Bonnaroo 2008.
Rob Loud/Getty Images
